member.name: T:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.XamlToHtmlConverter
member.summary:
This class is designed for the conversion of xaml flow documents to html data. The supported flow document elements are:
element description
Paragraph Converted to p. Applied attributes: align, style=margin***.
Hyperlink Converted to a. Applied attributes: href.
Bold, Underline, Italic elements. (which are specified via Run/Span and font***) Converted to b, u, or i.
Image Converted to img. Applied attributes: align, src, alt, id.
List (List, ListItem with marker style: Disc or Decimal) Converted to (ul, ol, li).
Table (TableRowGroup, TableRow, TableColumn, TableCell)
Converted to (table, tr, td). Applied attribute: "border" for table.
member.remarks: Based on XAML to HTML Conversion Demo: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa972129.aspx

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.XamlToHtmlConverter.ConvertXamlToHtml(System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument,Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.ValidationResult)
member.summary: Converts an flow document to html string.
member.param: Flow document.
Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.
member.returns: Well-formed xml string representing html equivalent for the input flow document.

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.XamlToHtmlConverter.AddBlock(System.Windows.Documents.Block,System.Xml.XmlTextWriter,Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.ValidationResult)
member.summary: Convert an flow document paragraph into its html representation.
member.param: Flow document block.
XmlTextWriter producing resulting html.
Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.
member.remarks: List, Paragraph, Table are supported Block elements. Section is not supported.

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.XamlToHtmlConverter.AddParagraph(System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph,System.Xml.XmlTextWriter,Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.ValidationResult)
member.summary: Convert an flow document block into its html representation.
member.param: Flow document paragraph.

Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.

member.summary: Convert an flow document table into its html representation.
member.param: Flow document table.

Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.XamlToHtmlConverter.AddInlines(System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection,System.Xml.XmlTextWriter,Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.ValidationResult)
member.summary: Convert an flow document inlines into their (combined!) html representation.
member.param: Flow document inlines collection.
XmlTextWriter producing resulting html.
Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.
member.remarks: Supported: Hyperlink, Bold, Underline, Italic as well as Run and InlineUIContainer for Image.

member.summary: Convert an flow document inlines into their (combined!) html representation.
member.param: Flow document inlines collection.
XmlTextWriter producing resulting html.
Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.
Inherited inline styles.
member.remarks: Supported: Hyperlink, Bold, Underline, Italic as well as Run and InlineUIContainer for Image.

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityEncode(System.String)
member.summary:
Based on the 'reflected' code (from the Framework System.Web.HttpServerUtility) listed on this page UrlEncode vs. HtmlEncode http://www.aspnetresources.com/blog/encoding_forms.aspx
PDF of unicode characters in the 0-127 (dec) range http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf
member.param: Unicode text
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) 0-9a-zA-Z and some punctuation (ASCII, basically) remain unchanged

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityEncode(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.returns: 0-9a-zA-Z and some punctuation (ASCII, basically) remain unchanged, everything else encoded

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts Html Entities back to their 'underlying' Unicode characters
member.param: Text containing Html Entities eg. Ӓ or é
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) 1-9a-zA-Z and some punctuation (ASCII, basically) remain unchanged

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityDecode(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts Html Entities back to their 'underlying' Unicode characters
member.param: Text containing Html Entities eg. Ӓ or é
Include angles and ampersand < > &
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) 1-9a-zA-Z and some punctuation (ASCII, basically) remain unchanged

member.name: F:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.entityResolver
member.summary: Static Regular Expression to match Html Entities in encoded text Looking for named-entity, decimal or hexadecimal formats http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/charset.html#h-5.3.1 http://www.i18nguy.com/markup/ncrs.html http://www.vigay.com/inet/acorn/browse-html2.html#entities

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.ResolveEntityNotAngleAmp(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Regex Match processing delegate to replace the Entities with their underlying Unicode character.
member.param: Regular Expression Match
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) and é becomes é BUT we dont modify the angles or ampersand

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.ResolveEntityAngleAmp(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Regex Match processing delegate to replace the Entities with their underlying Unicode character.
member.param: Regular Expression Match
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) and é becomes é

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HexToInt(System.String)
member.summary: For the 'hexadecimal' format ȳ we need to be able to convert hex into decimal... Thanks for this method to http://www.c-sharpcorner.com/Code/2002/Sept/HexColors.asp
member.remarks: This method converts a hexvalues string as 80FF into a integer. Note that you may NOT put a '#' at the beginning of string! There is not much error checking in this method. If the string does not represent a valid hexadecimal value it returns 0.
member.param: eg 00, 1A, ff, etc
member.returns: eg. 0, 26, 255 (zero if the inputstring is NOT a valid hexadecimal)

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.ExtendedHtmlUtility.EntityLookup(System.String)
member.summary: Thanks to this site for the Entity Reference http://www.vigay.com/inet/acorn/browse-html2.html#entities

member.name: T:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Html
member.summary:
This class is used to represent html in the domain model. The html type consists of: - HtmlData: this is the rough html. - HtmlDocument: this is the parsed html document (HtmlAgilityPack). - FlowDocumentData: this is the parsed flow document as string (corresponds to the HtmlData). - FlowDocument: this is the actual flow document. It is build using FlowDocumentData.
Apart from that, an opportunity to track warnings and errors is also given through the HtmlConversionResult property, which contains warnings, errors or just information messages gathered while converting. (The result is reset each time a conversion takes place.)
Conversions are available from html data to flow document and vice versa. Warning: Only a partial subset of both html data and flow document elements are supported.
member.remarks: This class is designed for the interpretation of a subset of html as needed by the VModell. (Refer to HtmlToXamlConverter and XamlToHtmlConverter for more information).

member.name: T:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.HtmlToXamlConverter
member.summary:
This class is designed for the conversion of a subset of html to Wpf (as needed by VModell). Thus, only the following elements are supported:
element description
p Converted to FlowDocument Paragraph. Accepted attributes: align, style=margin***.
a Converted to FlowDocument Hyperlink. Accepted attributes: href.
b, u, i Converted to FlowDocument Span/Run with corresponding style properties (FontWeight, FontStyle, TextDecorations).
img Converted to Image. Accepted attributes: align, src, alt, id.
List (ul, ol, li) Converted to FlowDocument List.
Table (table, tr, td)
Converted to FlowDocument Table. Accepted attribute: "border" for table.
Warning: colspan, rowspan are not supported.
member.remarks: Based on XAML to HTML Conversion Demo: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa972129.aspx Uses HtmlAgilityPack: http://www.codeplex.com/htmlagilitypack

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.HtmlToXamlConverter.ConvertHtmlToXaml(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument,Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.ValidationResult,System.String)
member.summary: Converts an html string into xaml string.
member.param: Html document.
Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.
Directory of the VModell instance containing the element that has a html property.
member.returns: Well-formed xml string representing XAML equivalent for the input html.

member.name: M:Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.Visualization.VMXExtensions.Html.Converter.HtmlToXamlConverter.AddBlock(System.Xml.XmlElement,HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,System.Collections.Generic.List{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode},Tum.PDE.ToolFramework.Modeling.ValidationResult,System.String)
member.summary: Analyzes the given XmlElement htmlElement, recognizes it as some HTML element and adds it as a child to a xamlParentElement.
member.param: Parent xaml element, to which new converted element will be added///
Source html element subject to convert to xaml.
Conversion result to store error and warning messages. Can be null.
Directory of the VModell instance containing the element that has a html property.
member.returns: Last processed html node. Normally it should be the same htmlElement as was passed as a paramater. The caller must use this node to get to next sibling from it.
